name: MLCompatibleAlert
summary: MLCompatibleAlert is a compatible alert and support for dynamic create alert's otherTitle button.
description: Apple in iOS8 introduced a brand-new UIAlertController, old UIAlertView and UIActionSheet gradually abandoned, but if you still support iOS7 system, you will have to write two sets of code. The MLCompatibleAlert solve this problem and support for dynamic create alert's otherTitle button,easy to use!
